import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../utils/auth'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { api, API_ENDPOINTS } from '../utils/api'; export default function Home() { const { user, isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const [recentReports, setRecentReports] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { if (isAuthenticated) { fetchDashboardData(); } }, [isAuthenticated]); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const [statsRes, reportsRes] = await Promise.all([ api.get(API_ENDPOINTS.REPORTS_STATS, true), api.get(`${API_ENDPOINTS.REPORTS}?limit=5`, true) ]); if (statsRes.success) setStats(statsRes.data); if (reportsRes.success) setRecentReports(reportsRes.data.reports || []); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to fetch dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const QuickActionCard = ({ icon, title, description, buttonText, link, variant = 'primary' }) => (
{title}

{description}

{buttonText}
); const StatCard = ({ icon, value, label, color = 'primary' }) => (
{label}
{value}
); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to LUCT Reporting System

Streamlined lecture reporting and academic management platform for {isAuthenticated ? ` ${user?.first_name} ${user?.last_name}` : ' Lecturers and Administrators'}

{!isAuthenticated && (
Get Started Sign In
)}
{isAuthenticated ? ( <> {/* Welcome Section */}
Welcome back, {user?.first_name} {user?.last_name}!

You are logged in as {user?.role}. {user?.role === 'Lecturer' ? ' Manage your lecture reports and track your teaching activities.' : ' Monitor all system reports and institutional performance.' }

{/* Stats Overview */} {stats && !loading && (

📊 Quick Overview

)} {/* Quick Actions */}

🚀 Quick Actions

{/* Recent Reports Section */} {recentReports.length > 0 && (
Recent Reports
{recentReports.map(report => { const attendancePercent = report.actual_present && report.total_registered ? Math.round((report.actual_present / report.total_registered) * 100) : 0; return ( navigate('/reports')}> ); })}
Report ID Course Date Attendance Status
LR-{report.id.toString().padStart(6, '0')}
{report.course_name}
{report.course_code}
{new Date(report.lecture_date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })}
= 80 ? 'bg-success' : attendancePercent >= 60 ? 'bg-warning' : 'bg-danger'}`} style={{ width: `${attendancePercent}%` }} >
{attendancePercent}%
Submitted
View All Reports
)} {/* Loading State */} {loading && (
Loading dashboard...

Loading your dashboard...

)} ) : ( /* Public Landing Page */
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose LUCT Reporting System?

Fast & Efficient

Streamline your lecture reporting process with our intuitive and efficient platform.

Data Insights

Gain valuable insights from comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.

Secure & Reliable

Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and reliability features.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join hundreds of educators using LUCT Reporting System to streamline their academic reporting.

Create Account Sign In
)} {/* Footer Section */}

LUCT Reporting System - Streamlining Academic Management

); }
